name: Berge knot
rephrased: A Berge knot is a specific type of knot in the 3-sphere where performing a non-trivial Dehn surgery results in a lens space, and it can be described as a simple closed curve on a genus-2 Heegaard surface primitive in both handlebodies.
implication_form: If a knot is doubly primitive, then it is a Berge knot.
